mapper.select: SELECT user_email, nvl(user_pwd, '') as user_pwd, nvl(user_name,'') as user_name, nvl(user_tel,'') as user_tel, nvl(user_jumin, '') as user_jumin, nvl(user_status,'') as user_status, nvl(to_char(user_reg_date,'yyyy.mm.dd'),'') as user_reg_date, nvl(user_gender,'') as user_gender, nvl(user_grade,'') as user_grade, user_profile_img as user_profile_img, user_profile_intro as user_profile_intro FROM tbl_user where user_email = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user ( user_email, user_pwd, user_name, user_tel, user_jumin, user_status, user_reg_date, user_gender, user_grade ) VALUES ( #{userEmail},#{userPwd},#{userName},#{userTel},#{userJumin},#{userStatus},SYSDATE,#{userGender},#{userGrade} )
mapper.select: select user_name from tbl_user where user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set USER_PROFILE_IMG = null where user_email = #{userEmail}
